4th International Workshop on

Search-Based Software Testing

March, 2011, Berlin, Germany

In conjunction with ICST 2011

IEEE International Conference on Testing, Verification and Validation

Welcome & Call for papers | Important Dates | Paper Submission | Prizes | Program Committee | Keynote | Program | ICST 2011

Program: Monday 21st March

10:30 - 10:45 Welcome and Introduction

10:45 - 12:00 Keynote: Phil McMinn

12:00 -14:00 Coffee break

2:00-3:30 Regular papers session
  • Thaise Yano, Eliane Martins and Fabiano L. De Sousa. MOST: a multi-objective search-based testing from EFSM
  • Arilo Dias Neto, Rosiane Rodrigues and Guilherme Travassos. Porantim-Opt: Optimizing the Combined Selection of Model-based Testing Techniques
  • Simon Poulding, John A. Clark and Helene Waeselynck. A Principled Evaluation of the Effect of Directed Mutation on Search-Based Statistical Testing
3:30-4:00 Coffee Break

4:00-5:00 Short papers session
  • Alin Stefanescu, Florentin Ipate, Raluca Lefticaru and Cristina Tudose. Towards Search-based Testing for Event-B Models
  • Sven Tuerpe Search-based Application Security Testing: Towards a Structured Search Space
5:00-5:15 Workshop Wrap-up

If you have any queries, please contact the program chair: Andrea Arcuri email:
